EditorData.stateContext: Doesn't necessarily play on seeing boat. Wulbren could use this line without freeing the tieflings or after freeing the tieflings, for instance.
Guards have sounded the alarm. The prisoners hear this.
If a character was on the way to the boat and couldn't leave because of various reasons,

Text.Value: Flimsy wood. Is it safe? Can it hold us?

EditorData.NodeContext: tense and nervous - waiting by the boat (it's briefly safe) to leave

Text.Value: Stone guide me - I'll be home soon.

EditorData.NodeContext: relief in his voice, as he disappears into the darkness (and successfully escapes)

EditorData.stateContext: IN COMBAT. One person signals that they have to defend the boat.

Text.Value: Ah! The noise. They will come soon - all of them.

EditorData.NodeContext: alarm is blaring as he makes his escape, knows the guards will come

Text.Value: The noise. I must leave - get to the boat. Now!

EditorData.NodeContext: player is in the middle of combat as nickels calls out to hurry or he willl leave without the player
confident, triumphant - urgent. Just freed the boat and is fleeing

EditorData.stateContext: IN COMBAT. Is preparing boat for departure. Under a LOT of stress.

Text.Value: The stone said to come here, but - but it's just water? Maybe over here?

EditorData.NodeContext: running through a prison, terrfied and frantic

Text.Value: If we are going, let's go. Waiting makes me nervous.

EditorData.NodeContext: tense and nervous - waiting by the boat (it's briefly safe) to leave
running through a prison, terrfied and frantic

Text.Value: Stop the evil ones. Stone - help me free the boat.

EditorData.NodeContext: Grim and determined - trying to break the chains that have tied up the boat. Most confident we've seen him.

Text.Value: The boat is nearly free - do not fail now.

EditorData.NodeContext: Grim and determined - trying to break the chains that have tied up the boat. Most confident we've seen him.

Text.Value: The stone says the boat - the boat is the way!

EditorData.NodeContext: sees a boat (he hates water) and knows it's the only way out of the prison

EditorData.stateContext: Character is about to disappear out of sight outside the tower, past the docks area.
OUT OF COMBAT. Another character is nearby and this character is idling by.

EditorData.NodeContext: nickels has just freed the boat - frantic and determined

EditorData.logicalname: NICKELS: Boat leaves after this line

Text.Value: I - I won't let you near the boat. Ever.

EditorData.stateContext: OUT OF COMBAT. Is preparing boat for departure. Under stress.

Text.Value: Stone shakes and screams. Don't listen.

EditorData.NodeContext: running through a prison, terrfied and frantic

EditorData.stateContext: OUT OF COMBAT. Running for their life to whatever escape point they may reach. It could be the boat, it could be the pier outside.

EditorData.NodeContext: Grim and determined - trying to break the chains that have tied up the boat. Most confident we've seen him.

Text.Value: Chains bind the boat. I will free it.

EditorData.NodeContext: Grim and determined - trying to break the chains that have tied up the boat. Most confident we've seen him.

Text.Value: Must we go by water? I - I don't want to.

EditorData.NodeContext: tense and nervous - waiting by the boat (it's briefly safe) to leave
leaving the player to die, upset and heartbroken

Synopsis: Collection of solo ADs used by character during the Jailbreak escape in Moonrise Towers.
